definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: In this context, the internet can serve as a great equalizer.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，互联网可发挥调节器的作用。

sentences.english: Humans are sovereign beings by virtue of their indwelling adjusters.
sentences.chinese: 人的总称凭借他们的内涵调节器，是至高无上的存在。

sentences.english: It is discussed how to apply intelligent regulator to control the combustion value of mixing gas.
sentences.chinese: 诣在探讨应用智能调节器控制混合煤气热值。

sentences.english: The tone is significantly affected by the weight and mass distribution of the vibrating plates.
sentences.chinese: 共振调节器改变音板的重量也就影响到乐器的基音。

sentences.english: Snap, hook & loop and zipper waist with adjusters.
sentences.chinese: 管理单元，钩和调节器的循环与拉链腰部。
安装一个设定程序的恒温调节器。

sentences.english: The multi-function regulator allows precise temperature adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 这个多功能调节器可以准确调节温度。

sentences.english: Some cars have an adjuster that is actuated when the emergency brake is applied.
sentences.chinese: 有些汽车在紧急制动时会用自激励调节器。

sentences.english: In addition, the low-friction design and the side pressure regulator both contribute to excellent fuel economy.
sentences.chinese: 此外，低磨檫设计和侧压力调节器到好的燃油经济性。

sentences.english: Removable hood with drawstring adjusters and faux fur trim.
sentences.chinese: 与索绳调节器和人造皮毛修剪的可移动罩。

sentences.english: The whole area is reputed to be a "huge natural air-conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 这里的整个区域都被享誉为巨大的天然空气调节器。

sentences.english: Pull the adjuster bar from the head restraint .
sentences.chinese: 从头部保护装置拔除调节器条。

sentences.english: I set it up for lower pressure using a built-in bypass regulator.
sentences.chinese: 我把它较低的压力，使用内置在旁路调节器。

sentences.english: It proves that by using newtype drainage controller, the effect is better, it.
sentences.chinese: 实践证明，采用新型排水调节器，效果更。

sentences.english: A hot & cold mixer is used to make the water temperature comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 冷热水调节器是用于使水温适宜。

sentences.english: Replaced R engine bleed air regulator, running-up test OK, pressure same.
sentences.chinese: 更换右发引气调节器，试车正常，左右压力一致。

definition: to adjust/to regulate/to harmonize/to reconcile (accountancy etc)
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
